name: Resident Evil: Revelations: Collection
overview: The Resident Evil: Revelations - Collection is a compilation of both games of the series: • Resident Evil: Revelations • Resident Evil: Revelations 2 Both games are released on the Switch for the first time in retail form through this release. Resident Evil: Revelation 2 is packed-in as a download version, while the first is on cartridge. Both games, next to the base game, feature all previously available commercial add-ons.
